Article.ArticleTitle: Author Correction: The CLE9/10 secretory peptide regulates stomatal and vascular development through distinct receptors.

AbstractText: In the version of this Article originally published, the authors incorrectly stated that the work was supported by Innovative Areas grant number 25003006; the correct number is 25113006. This statement has now been amended in all online versions of the Article.
